<<<<<<< HEAD
A declaration of the iust causes of his Maiesties proceeding against those ministers, who are now lying in prison, attainted of high treason. Set foorth by his Maiesties Counsell of his kingdome of Scotland Scotland. Privy Council. Haddington, Thomas Hamilton, Earl of, 1563-1637, attributed name.
[2], 45, [1] p.
By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : Anno 1606.
Sometimes attributed to Sir Thomas Hamilton, Earl of Haddington. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======

[2], 45, [1] p.
By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : Anno 1606.
Sometimes attributed to Sir Thomas Hamilton, Earl of Haddington. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
